original_text: In the past, even when Saul was our king, you led the Israelites in war. The Lord your God said to you, “You will take care of my people, as a shepherd takes care of his sheep. You will rule over my people, Israel.” ’
korean_text: 전에 곧 사울이 왕이 되었을 때에도 이스라엘을 거느리고 출입하게 한 자가 왕이시었고 왕의 하나님 여호와께서도 왕에게 말씀하시기를 네가 내 백성 이스라엘의 목자가 되며 내 백성 이스라엘의 주권자가 되리라 하셨나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: even when Saul was our king
you led the Israelites in war
The Lord your God said to you
You will take care of my people
as a shepherd takes care of his sheep
You will rule over my people
